Translations.Text: And had there been a town that believed and profited from its belief other than the folk of Jonah? When they believed, We removed from them the punishment of degradation in this present life and gave them enjoyment for a while
And if thy Lord willed, all would have believed who are on the earth altogether. So wouldst thou compel humanity against their will until they become ones who believe
And it would not have been for any person to believe but by the permission of God. And He lays disgrace on those who are not reasonable
Say: Look on what is in the heavens and the earth. And neither the signs nor the warning avail a folk who believe not
So wait they awhile but like in the days of those who passed away before them? Say: So wait awhile. I am with you among the ones waiting awhile
Again, We rescue Our Messengers and those who believed. Thus, it is an obligation upon Us to deliver the ones who believe

Say: O humanity! If you were in uncertainty as to my way of life, then, I will not worship those whom you worship other than God. Rather, I worship only God Who will call you to Himself. And I was commanded that I be among the ones who believe
and that: Settest thou thy face to the way of life of a monotheist. And be thou not among the ones who are polytheists
And call not to other than God what neither profits nor hurts thee. And if thou wert to accomplish that, truly, thou wouldst be among the ones who are unjust
